titles.title: Shawnee National Forest Conservation Act of 2025
Shawnee National Forest Conservation Act of 2025
Shawnee National Forest Conservation Act of 2025
A bill to designate the Camp Hutchins Wilderness and establish Special Management Areas in the Shawnee National Forest in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry. Reported by Senator Boozman with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 217.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
